front.title: Definitions of Textual Conventions and OBJECT-IDENTITIES for IP Over InfiniBand (IPOVERIB) Management

abstract.t: This memo defines a Management Information Base (MIB) module that contains Textual Conventions and OBJECT-IDENTITIES for use in definitions of management information for IP Over InfiniBand (IPOVERIB) networks. The intent is that these TEXTUAL CONVENTIONs (TCs) will be imported and used in IPOVERIB related MIB modules.
